loading

Class ShaderLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • loading.ShaderLoader

  • public class ShaderLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to upload a shader from file to GPU
    To change the used shader use ARBShaderObjects.glUseProgramObjectARB(id of the shader);
    Author:
    jafi2

    • Method Detail

      • loadShader

        public static int loadShader(java.lang.String vertexShaderName,
                             java.lang.String fragmentShaderName)
        Uploads a shader to the gpu and prints shader debug information
        Parameters:
        vertexShaderName - the location of the vertex shader relative to Game.gamePath
        fragmentShaderName - the location of the fragment shader relative to Game.gamePath
        Returns:
        the id of the shader object

      • createShader

        private static int createShader(java.lang.String filename,
                                int shaderType)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a shader of the specified type
        Parameters:
        filename - the location of the shader file
        shaderType - the type of the shader
        Returns:
        the id of the shader
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - thrown exceptions during shader creation

      • getLogInfo

        get the log info from a shader
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the log info

      • readFileAsString

        private static java.lang.String readFileAsString(java.lang.String filename)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Reads a shader file in as string
        Parameters:
        filename - the location of the file
        Returns:
        the text read from the file
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exceptions thrown during loading
